infoText1: Equity for Punks was a ground-breaking initiative that flipped the script on traditional crowd funding. Breaking records worldwide, Equity for Punks was a unique way for beer enthusiasts to become stakeholders in the Good Ship BrewDog.
infoText2: Through Equity for Punks, we invited beer lovers to invest in the business, allowing them to own a slice of the brewery and share in its success and growth. They also got some pretty awesome perks along the way too, including discounts, beers, a world-famous Annual General Mayhem and more.
infoText3: Our last Equity for Punk investment round closed in 2021, so we are no longer accepting more investors.
